td.content: take 1 tablet (5MG) by oral route every day with food, swallowing whole. Do not break, crush, chew and/or divide.
insert 60 milliliter (4G) by rectal route every day at bedtime
take 1 tablet (9MG) by oral route every day in the morning swallowing whole with water. Do not break, crush, dissolve and/or chew.
take 1 tablet (550MG) by oral route 2 times every day
take 4 capsule (1500MG) by oral route every day in the morning
Take as directed on instructions provided by phyiscian

td.content: apply by topical route 2 times every day to the affected area(s)
insert 1 suppository (25MG) by rectal route 2 times every day
